department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Microfabrication Laboratory
course.faculty_text: Fawwaz Habbal, Marko Loncar, and Peter RH Stark
course.description: Introduction to micro- and nanofabrication processes used for photonic and electronic devices. Students use state-of-the-art cleanroom in Center for Nanoscale Systems to fabricate transistors and light-emitting diodes (LEDs). Lectures on fabrication processes, including lithography, deposition, etching, oxidation, implantation, diffusion and electrical characterization.
course.prerequisites: Physics 11a and Physics 11b; or Physics 15a and 15b or equivalent.
